functions.name: Gooey_Init
functions.brief: Initializes the Gooey system with the selected backend. Currently, only the GLPS (OpenGL) backend is supported.

functions.name: *GooeyTimer_Create
functions.brief: Creates a new timer object.

functions.name: GooeyTimer_Destroy
functions.brief: Destroys the timer and frees its resources.

functions.name: GooeyTimer_Stop
functions.brief: Stops the timer if it is running.

functions.name: GooeyWidget_MakeVisible
functions.brief: Sets the visibility state of a widget.

functions.name: GooeyWidget_MoveTo
functions.brief: Moves the widget to a new position.

functions.name: GooeyWidget_Resize
functions.brief: Resizes the widget.

functions.name: *GooeyTheme_LoadFromFile
functions.brief: Loads a theme from the specified file path. This function reads a theme file and returns a `GooeyTheme` object that can be applied to Gooey windows.

functions.name: *GooeyWindow_Create
functions.brief: Creates a new Gooey window with the specified title, width, and height. This function initializes and returns a new window. The window can be customized with various properties such as its visibility and theme.

functions.name: GooeyWindow_Cleanup
functions.brief: Cleans up the resources associated with Gooey windows. This function deallocates memory and resources for the specified windows and their associated widgets.

functions.name: GooeyWindow_MakeResizable
functions.brief: Sets the resizable property of a window. This function determines whether the user can resize the window. If the window is made resizable, the user can adjust its size at runtime.

functions.name: GooeyWindow_MakeVisible
functions.brief: Sets the visibility of a Gooey window. This function controls whether the window is visible or hidden.

functions.name: GooeyWindow_RegisterWidget
functions.brief: Registers a widget with the specified window. This function adds a widget (such as a button, label, or slider) to a window, so it can be rendered and interact with user input.

functions.name: GooeyWindow_RequestRedraw
functions.brief: Requests a redraw of the window. This function triggers a redraw of the specified window, typically in response to changes that affect its appearance (e.g., updates to the window's content or layout).

functions.name: GooeyWindow_Run
functions.brief: Runs the Gooey window's event loop. This function starts the main event loop for the specified window, where user input and window events are processed until the window is closed.

functions.name: GooeyWindow_SetTheme
functions.brief: Sets the theme for the specified Gooey window. This function applies the given theme to the window, updating its appearance.

functions.name: GooeySignal_Create
functions.description: GooeySignal_Slot *slots; /**< List of slots (callbacks) associated with the signal

functions.name: GooeySignal_Emit
functions.brief: Emits a signal. This function triggers the signal, invoking all linked callbacks in the order they were added. Each callback receives the specified data.

functions.name: GooeySignal_Link
functions.brief: Links a callback function to a signal. This function connects a signal to a specific callback function. When the signal is emitted, the callback function will be executed. The callback is linked to the signal and can be triggered when the signal is emitted.

functions.name: GooeySignal_UnLinkAll
functions.brief: Unlinks all callbacks from a signal. Removes all callback functions linked to the specified signal, effectively clearing its event listeners.

functions.name: parser_load_theme_from_file
functions.brief: Structure representing a theme for the Gooey UI. The colors in the theme are stored as unsigned long values representing the color codes (typically in hexadecimal format).

functions.name: GooeyButton_SetHighlight
functions.brief: Highlights or unhighlights a button. This function visually indicates whether a button is highlighted, which can be used to show focus or selection.

functions.name: GooeyButton_SetText
functions.brief: Sets the text of the button. This function updates the label text displayed on the button.

functions.name: GooeyCanvas_DrawLine
functions.brief: Draws a rectangle onto the user-defined canvas. The rectangle can be either filled with a solid color or outlined.

functions.name: GooeyCanvas_SetForeground
functions.brief: Draws an arc onto the user-defined canvas. The arc is drawn within the specified bounding box and between the given angles.

functions.name: GooeyContainer_AddWidget
functions.brief: Adds a widget to a specific container within the window.

functions.name: GooeyContainer_Create
functions.brief: Creates a new container with the given position and dimensions.

functions.name: GooeyContainer_InsertContainer
functions.brief: Inserts a sub-container into the given container.

functions.name: GooeyContainer_SetActiveContainer
functions.brief: Sets which container is currently active/visible.

functions.name: GooeyDropdown_Update
functions.brief: Header file for the GooeyDropdown module. Provides functions to create, handle, and render dropdown menus within a GooeyWindow.

functions.name: GooeyDropSurface_Clear
functions.brief: Header file for the GooeyDropSurface module.

functions.name: GooeyImage_Damage
functions.brief: Marks the image as needing redrawing (damaged).

functions.name: GooeyImage_SetImage
functions.brief: Image handling functions for the Gooey GUI library. This file contains functions for adding and drawing images in a Gooey window.

functions.name: *GooeyLabel_Create
functions.brief: Header file for the GooeyLabel module. Provides functions for creating, modifying, and rendering text labels within a GooeyWindow.

functions.name: GooeyLabel_SetColor
functions.brief: Sets the text color of a label. Changes the text color of a label to the specified color.

functions.name: GooeyLabel_SetText
functions.brief: Sets the text of an existing label. Updates the text displayed by a given GooeyLabel.

functions.name: GooeyLayout_AddChild
functions.brief: Header file for the GooeyLayout module. Provides functionality for managing and arranging widgets within a structured layout inside a GooeyWindow.

functions.name: GooeyLayout_Build
functions.brief: Finalizes and builds the layout. This function applies the layout rules and arranges all child widgets accordingly.

functions.name: GooeyList_AddItem
functions.brief: Adds an item to the specified list widget.

functions.name: GooeyList_ClearItems
functions.brief: Clears all items from the specified list widget. Removes all list items from the provided list widget.

functions.name: GooeyList_ShowSeparator
functions.brief: Toggles the visibility of the separator in a list widget. Enables or disables the visual separator between list items.

functions.name: GooeyList_UpdateItem
functions.brief: Updates the title and description of a specific item in the list.

functions.name: *GooeyMenu_AddChild
functions.brief: Adds a child menu item to the window's menu. Creates a submenu or a category inside the main menu.

functions.name: *GooeyMenu_Set
functions.brief: Header file for the Gooey menu system. Provides functions to create and manage menus and menu items within a Gooey window.

functions.name: GooeyMessageBox_Show
functions.brief: Displays the specified message box window. This function makes the message box visible on the screen. The message box must have been created using `GooeyMessageBox_Create`.

functions.name: *GooeyMeter_Create
functions.brief: Creates a meter widget. Initializes a new GooeyMeter widget at the specified position and size, with an initial value, a label, and an optional icon.

functions.name: GooeyMeter_Update
functions.brief: Updates the value displayed by the meter.

functions.name: *GooeyPlot_Create
functions.brief: Creates a plot widget. Adds a plot widget of the specified type to the given position and size, using the provided plot data.

functions.name: GooeyPlot_Update
functions.brief: Updates an existing plot with new data. Updates the content of the given plot widget while maintaining its configuration and type.

functions.name: *GooeyProgressBar_Create
functions.brief: Creates a progress bar widget. Initializes a new progress bar at the specified position and size, with an initial value.

functions.name: GooeyProgressBar_Update
functions.brief: Updates the value of an existing progress bar. Changes the displayed progress to the new value.

functions.name: *GooeyRadioButtonGroup_Create
functions.brief: Creates a new radio button group. Allows grouping of multiple radio buttons, ensuring single selection.

functions.name: GooeyRadioButtonGroup_Draw
functions.brief: Draws all radio buttons in the group on the window. Renders the visual state of each radio button, reflecting selection.

functions.name: GooeyRadioButtonGroup_HandleClick
functions.brief: Handles click events for a group of radio buttons. Ensures that only one radio button in the group is selected at a time.

functions.name: GooeyRadioButton_HandleClick
functions.brief: Handles a click event on radio buttons within a window. Checks if a radio button was clicked and triggers the appropriate callback.

functions.name: GooeySlider_GetValue
functions.brief: Retrieves the current value of the slider. Returns the current slider value, guaranteed to be within the configured range.

functions.name: GooeySlider_SetValue
functions.brief: Sets the slider's value. Updates the slider's position and value to the specified value within its range.

functions.name: GooeySwitch_GetState
functions.brief: Retrieves the current value of the slider. Returns the current slider value, guaranteed to be within the configured range.

functions.name: GooeySwitch_Toggle
functions.brief: Sets the slider's value. Updates the slider's position and value to the specified value within its range.

functions.name: *GooeyTabs_Create
functions.brief: Creates a tab widget. Creates a GooeyTabs widget at the specified position with given dimensions. If `is_sidebar` is true, the tabs behave as a sidebar.

functions.name: GooeyTabs_AddWidget
functions.brief: Adds a widget to a specified tab. Associates a widget with a tab identified by tab_id.

functions.name: GooeyTabs_InsertTab
functions.brief: Inserts a new tab with the specified name. Adds a new tab to the tab widget.

functions.name: GooeyTabs_SetActiveTab
functions.brief: Sets the active tab. Switches the active tab to the one specified by tab_id.

functions.name: GooeyTabs_Sidebar_Close
functions.brief: Closes the sidebar tabs (if tabs are in sidebar mode).

functions.name: GooeyTabs_Sidebar_Open
functions.brief: Opens the sidebar tabs (if tabs are in sidebar mode).

functions.name: *GooeyTextbox_GetText
functions.brief: Gets the current text from the textbox.

functions.name: GooeyTextbox_Draw
functions.brief: Draws the textbox on the specified window. Renders the textbox UI, reflecting its current state and contents.

functions.name: GooeyTextbox_HandleClick
functions.brief: Handles click events on the textbox. Detects clicks on the textbox area and activates the textbox for input if clicked.

functions.name: GooeyTextbox_HandleKeyPress
functions.brief: Processes key press events for the textbox. Updates the textbox content based on keyboard input.

functions.name: GooeyTextbox_SetText
functions.brief: Sets the text content of the textbox.

data_types.name: WIDGET_TYPE
data_types.brief: Internal definitions for the Gooey GUI library.

data_types.name: GooeySignal
data_types.description: struct GooeySignal_Slot *next; /**< Pointer to the next slot in the list

data_types.name: GooeySignal_Slot
data_types.brief: A slot representing a linked callback in the signal system. A slot contains a callback function, its associated context, and a link to the next slot in a potentially linked list of callbacks.

data_types.name: GooeySignal_Slot
data_types.description: GooeySignal_CallbackFunction callback; /**< The callback function to be executed

data_types.name: base
data_types.brief: Structure representing a theme for the Gooey UI. The colors in the theme are stored as unsigned long values representing the color codes (typically in hexadecimal format).

header_files.name: gooey_common.h
header_files.brief: Internal definitions for the Gooey GUI library.

header_files.name: gooey_button.h
header_files.brief: Button handling functions for the Gooey GUI library.

header_files.name: gooey_canvas.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the GooeyCanvas module.

header_files.name: gooey_checkbox.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the GooeyCheckbox module.

header_files.name: gooey_dropdown.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the GooeyDropdown module. Provides functions to create, handle, and render dropdown menus within a GooeyWindow.

header_files.name: gooey_drop_surface.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the GooeyDropSurface module.

header_files.name: gooey_image.h
header_files.brief: Image handling functions for the Gooey GUI library. This file contains functions for adding and drawing images in a Gooey window.

header_files.name: gooey_label.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the GooeyLabel module. Provides functions for creating, modifying, and rendering text labels within a GooeyWindow.

header_files.name: gooey_layout.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the GooeyLayout module. Provides functionality for managing and arranging widgets within a structured layout inside a GooeyWindow.

header_files.name: gooey_menu.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the Gooey menu system. Provides functions to create and manage menus and menu items within a Gooey window.
